Detailed Description

A special scale draw made for QwtDial

See also:
QwtDial, QwtCompass

void QwtDialScaleDraw::showLabels (  bool  enable  ) 
 

En/disable labels

If labels are disabled, QwtDialScaleDraw::label returns always QString::null. Otherwise it calls QwtDial::scaleLabel of the parent dial.

See also:
QwtDialScaleDraw::visibleLabels
